params.token: The address of the deposited token

params.from: Address to deposit the tokens from

params.to: Address to send the tokens to

params.add: True for add, false for subtract
params.amount: The amount to adjust the balance by

params.token: The address of the withdrawal token

deploy().notice: This is just here to satisfy the interface and allow YieldManager to call during system deploy

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Used by YieldManager to deposit funds.

depositFrom(address,address[],uint256[]).notice: Deposit funds from a depositor into the OTC contract.

getPendingYield(address).notice: This is just here to satisfy the interface

harvestYield().notice: This is just here to satisfy the interface

send(address,address[],uint256[]).notice: Send funds from the OTC contract to a recipient.

sendEth(uint256,address).notice: Send ETH from the OTC contract to a recipient.

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Used by YieldManager to withdraw funds.

withdrawEth(uint256,address).notice: Withdraw ETH from the OTC contract
